roleset.name: to provide with uniforms
roleset.note: UNIFORM-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. No Vncls. (from uniform.01-v)

example.name: is this really a verb?
example.text: He uniformed the members in fine regalia at his own expense.

roleset.name: consistent
roleset.note: UNIFORM-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on Medi-seedcorpus. (from uniform.01-j)

role.descr: specific aspect of arg1 that is uniform

example.name: arg1
example.text: The cells are uniform and have granular cytoplasm and are of low cytologic atypia .

example.name: uniform in size
example.text: The leaves were uniform in size.
